data.title: Verse in Australia 1959 a yearly collection FROM THE LIBRARY OF AUSTRALIAN AUTHOR CHRISTOPHER KOCH containing Koch's poem Love Present, Love Past Signed by Christopher Koch by Koch, Christopher; Clark
data.meta_description: Signed by Author(s) - stiff card - Australian Letters, Adelaide - 1959 - Dust Jacket Included - 1959 edition of Verse in Australia, FROM THE LIBRARY OF AUSTRALIAN AUTHOR CHRISTOPHER KOCH, flat-signed by Koch to front endpaper; contains Koch's poem Love Present, Love Past - the poem is marked by Koch in the contents with an asterisk, and one correction is made by Koch to the text of the poem (where a t is left out of the word thought); other poets include David Campbell, Rosemary Dobson, Anne Bell, Flexmore Hudson, Vivian Smith, Judith Wright; Very Good throughout; dustwrapper a little rubbed, toned to spine, o.w. G-VG. Dustwrapper. 49pp. large 8vo. Very Good in G-VG dustwrapper (minor annotation by Koch) Very Good in G-VG dustwrapper (minor annotation by Koch) - Verse in Australia 1959 a yearly collection FROM THE LIBRARY OF AUSTRALIAN AUTHOR CHRISTOPHER KOCH containing Koch's poem Love Present, Love Past Signed by Christopher Koch
data.text:
About this Item

1959 edition of Verse in Australia, FROM THE LIBRARY OF AUSTRALIAN AUTHOR CHRISTOPHER KOCH, flat-signed by Koch to front endpaper; contains Koch's poem Love Present, Love Past - the poem is marked by Koch in the contents with an asterisk, and one correction is made by Koch to the text of the poem (where a t is left out of the word thought); other poets include David Campbell, Rosemary Dobson, Anne Bell, Flexmore Hudson, Vivian Smith, Judith Wright; Very Good throughout; dustwrapper a little rubbed, toned to spine, o.w. G-VG. Dustwrapper. 49pp. large 8vo. Very Good in G-VG dustwrapper (minor annotation by Koch) Very Good in G-VG dustwrapper (minor annotation by Koch). Seller Inventory # 19715

Contact seller

Report this item

Gotcha By The Books has been selling online since 2000, and the owner has been selling second hand and rare books since 1985. We specialise in poetry, australian poetry, literature,art and culture, performing arts, literary criticism, philosophy, and related subjects. We also stock australiana, history, theology, aboriginal australia, occult and new age.

We accept Direct Deposit for customers within Australia. Care is taken to describe books accurately, but if you should receive a book whi...

More Information

Shipping Terms:

Orders usually ship within 2 business days. Shipping costs are based on books weighing 2.2 LB, or 1 KG. If your book order is heavy or oversized, we may contact you to let you know extra shipping is required. If the book is small or light weight we will reduce the postage charge where applicable. For rare or expensive books we will send within Australia by Registered Mail at no extra charge to the customer.
